Title: Relates to providing notice to restaurants of any regulation changes
Summary: Relates to providing notice to restaurants or other eating establishments of any new or amended regulations.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, the labor law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing notice to restaurants of any regulation changes
